amendment.description: To modify the authorization of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1692 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Carper. (consideration: CR S2369) To modify the authorization of appropriations.
